name: Zooza
tag_list: pets, pet-industry, veterinarians, saas, cloud-computing, cloud, event-management, electronic-medical-records, emr
overview:
Zooza provides cloud-based applications for the pet industry. The company offers a product for veterinary practices to use in managing front-desk workflow that manages customer requests for prescriptions and appointments. The product also lets veterinary staff and pet owners store Electronic Medical Records (EMR) such as health history, medications, rabies certificates, blood panels, and more.

Zooza also offers event and club management software to animal clubs around the world. This allows clubs to post upcoming shows, trials, and seminars, and then to take online entries for these events using the Zooza application. The product includes full reporting, automatic event catalog generation, and email marketing for the club’s events.

As a consumer-facing product, Zooza is a social platform for animal enthusiasts. Users can upload photos, create albums, connect with friends, collect “likes” for their pets, and contribute to the daily worldwide Zoo Chatter. With complete online profiles for an individual’s pets, Zooza takes the hassle out of pet ownership by automating common things like making vet appointments, refilling prescriptions, attending events, and joining clubs.

The use of cloud computing and SaaS solutions for the pet industry is key to reducing the costs for SMBs and for bringing new capabilities quickly to market. Zooza will continue to expand its product in ways that connect pet businesses to pet owners in the more than $50billion pet industry.
